name: Looking For Cats In a Badly Drawn City
name_original: Looking For Cats In a Badly Drawn City
description:
Welcome to the badly drawn town where the kittens hide!


Explore the amazing corners of a city full of jagged lines and curved outlines. Your goal is to find 100 cats hidden in the most unexpected places!



Make your way through the streets and alleyways, looking for cat silhouettes on the roofs and windows of skyscrapers. Listen for magical purrs and follow tails flickering through the clouds!

Look for cats in parks with their mysterious trees, under bridges and in the most unexpected places, but be careful, some cats will turn their backs on you and you will only be able to spot them by their silhouette.




Use your imagination and keen eye to spot all the cats in the most unusual situations.
